title: Georgia Fowler shows off her enviably toned tummy in bikini
text:
She's currently in Sydney after having stormed the catwalk at Paris Fashion Week.

And New Zealand-born Georgia Fowler showed off her enviable bikini body, in a short video shared to Instagram Stories on Tuesday.

The 27-year-old sported a skimpy grey two-piece and posed up a storm inside her bathroom, zooming in on her washboard stomach.

Not an inch to pinch! Victoria's Secret model Georgia Fowler (pictured) showed off her toned tummy in a skimpy grey bikini, in a short clip shared to Instagram Stories on Tuesday

Georgia added subtle touches of bling in the form of a gold bracelet and matching necklace, and tucked her cropped brunette locks behind her ears.

The IMG-represented star appeared to go without makeup, drawing attention to her natural beauty.

Georgia arrived in Sydney earlier this month and is set to become a regular fixture at Spring Racing Carnival.

Bling: The IMG-represented star added touches of bling in the form of a gold bracelet and necklace, and tucked her cropped brunette locks behind her ears

Abs-olutely incredible: Georgia zoomed in on her washboard stomach, as she posed up a storm in her Sydney bathroom

The brunette described her style as 'classic' in an interview with Vogue Australia last week.

'I like to think my style is easy going, classic and adaptable. I'm not big on trends and though I love a few standout pieces a season, I tend to buy fashion that can be worn many ways (thus easy to travel with) and can stand the test of time.'

Georgia also encouraged aspiring models to have 'grit' in order to succeed in such a competitive industry.

Advice: Speaking to Vogue Australia last week, Georgia encouraged aspiring models to have 'grit' in order to succeed in such a competitive industry

'Success is not overnight for most and if it is, it can be very fleeting,' she told the fashion magazine.

'The best careers I know come from relationship building, never giving up and always being a joy to work with on set so you continue to get re-booked.'

Georgia went on to add that it's not just about looks, but rather your personality and your willingness to put in the hard yards.
description: Victoria's Secret model Georgia Fowler, 27, took to Instagram Stories on Tuesday to show off her incredibly toned physique.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
